name: Global Soccer Manager
description: In Global Soccer Manager there are no restrictions, the whole world becomes playable! The 210 playable nations and the 4500+ playable clubs guarantees truely infinite hours to play. An Editor is included too, so you are free to modify the game's databases as you like.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium D 3.4GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 500 MB available space
